Articles.Content:
Is there like a mod which allows KSP to work on the Oculus Rift?

It would be really awesome to do an IVA with Oculus Rift.
I would like it too... if I could get my dad to buy me a rift.

Moved to General Add-on Affairs, where add-ons are requested.

I'm not aware of a mod for Oculus Rift compatibility, though there was some success making it work through external programs in this thread from more than a year ago.
